boston_housing.origin: Housing in the area of Boston Mass

breast-cancer.origin: Breast cancer patient data as either a recurrence or no recurrence of cancer

pima-indians-diabetes.origin: This dataset is originally from the National Institute of Diabetes and Digestive and Kidney Diseases

sonar.origin: The Sonar Dataset involves the prediction of whether or not an object is a mine or a rock given the strength of sonar returns at different angles: https://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/datasets/Connectionist+Bench+(Sonar,+Mines+vs.+Rocks)

multicollinearity.origin: Multicollinearity Example: Predicting Bone Density in the Femur

heteroscedasticity.origin: Heteroscedasticity Example: Number of automobile accidents by the population of towns and cities

big_mart_outlets.origin: 2013 sales data for 1559 products across 10 stores in different cities

random2.origin: Simple random regression dataset with outliers

wholesale_customers_data.origin: The data set refers to clients of a wholesale distributor. It includes the annual spending in monetary units (m.u.) on diverse product categories.
